TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Gra...
Wait... Oh, ...!!!
Now we know who is guilty in the bees extinction.

I wish for the bees survival.

Edited July 29, 2019 by kerbiloid

4 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:

Gra...
Wait... Oh, ...!!!
Now we know who is guilty in the bees extinction.

I wish for the bees survival.

Gra... Ouch! Gra... Ouch! Gra... DIE *kills bee with a blanket*.

I wish people actually know how actually to rush B in CS:GO.

Congratulatins now everybody in CS:GO is playing cardi-B songs in the voice chat

 

I wish for  my next wish to not to go wrong

Edited July 29, 2019 by KerbolExplorer

Granted. Now your wishes will go to your right side.

I wish I'll have time to play KSP today.

Granted, now go play Kebab sauce party. Rated +18

I wish for toilet paper.

Granted. You are crushed by 275 trillion tons of toilet paper.

I wish for a mostly edible potato.

Granted. You have a whole barn of potato and a shovel. May you find an edible one.

I wish to find what I'm currently searching in the book.

Granted. You've found the table of contents in whichis a huge wall of text.

I wish tomorrow's lunch will have a fruit juice instead of a month-long mineral water.

EDIT : Seriously, the last moment we had fruit juice all month-long is last year.

Edited July 30, 2019 by FahmiRBLXian

Granted. Tomorrow they give you a month-short mineral juice.

I wish there were not just mineralized fishbones and snails here, but also dinos.

Granted, now the world have been turned into a Jurassic Park, and you will be eaten.

I wish for a dog.

Granted. But the dog doesn't wish for you and runs away.

I wish to notice that it's the 600th page in this thread. So many wishes...

Okay you now notice

I wish for my Switch's Joy con not to drift

Granted... Probably... As I have no idea what's Switch's Joy con and how it drifts.

I wish to still avoid this knowledge.

Granted. You became knowledge-less and acted up like a prehistoric man.

I wish our complaints made to the Dining Hall people has been made into considerations.

Granted. No more Dining Hall at your place, it was not enough good for you.

I wish you also had Lunch Hall and Breakfast Hall.

Granted, but a bomb is planted  in there.

I wish for a wish because I wasted my previous wish on a stupid wish.

Granted. You get a wish but it's automatically unwished because you anyway would waste it on something same wise.

I wish to know, why did they have Dining Hall when they now easily live without it?

Because the hall deserves its place there. 

Anyhow currently the dining hall management people gave us a Google Forms link to give feedback on their service. This includes hygiene, quality & quantity and menu options. So far these are the issues I'm aware of; worm(s) inside food (I'm not one of the 'fortunate' people), snacks served in low portions and the removal of our favorite menu; Nasi Lemak (Darn that's delicious).

I wish my moron classmate dies during Physical Education class.

Edited July 31, 2019 by FahmiRBLXian

You can't wish for someone's death

 

I wish for 69 more wishes

Granted. You have wished 69 times more for he can't wish what he wished.

I wish somebody bans in the ban thread, as currently I'm every second banner there.

Edited August 13, 2019 by kerbiloid

Granted, but that someone is a mod who simply bans the entire ban thread.

I wish for....cricket tacos (if it's gonna be corrupted I may as well corrupt it from the start).

Granted, but You eat the cricket taco only to realize that the waiter laced it with cricket blood. You vomit until you die. 

I wish that people would find me irritating

Granted. Now people made you feel itchy all the time.

I wish my laptop's black screen problem gets resolved. I got my assignment in there!

It works, but only while the power level is exactly 22.55 percent

I wish for a fish wish dish.

You eat it the best 

1 hour ago, Fraston said:

fish wish dish

ever made. Only to realize you are allergic to fish. You go into anyphylactic sick and are immediately brought to a hospital. You recover, but receive a large bill.

 

I wish I could fly an F22
